name: BetterByDesign: Figma Helpers
description:
A simple library of components that I use to stay organized and work more efficiently in Figma.


This initial version contains components for:

  • File thumbnail
  • Documentation page
  • Color swatch
  • File and component status
  • Cursor
  • Note


---


This library has an accompanying Substack post where I go into detail around its creation and contents. Check it out if you want context on why I made it, how I use it and other implementation specifics.


View Substack post
